subject: Basketball (College)
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Robert L. Barchi is the subject of mounting criticism in the aftermath of the firing of men’s basketball coach Mike Rice. Some faculty members have called for his resignation.
snippet: Robert L. Barchi is the subject of mounting criticism in the aftermath of the firing of men’s basketball coach Mike Rice. Some faculty members have called for his resignation.
